comments.creator: mwu.code@gmail.com
comments.text:
From https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=696042#c25

"We should also centralize estimating remaining battery time when the
system doesn't provide it.  That code can kick in when remainingTime
is some sentinel value.  That should be another followup, plz.  We'll
coordinate with mounir."
comments.author: mwu.code@gmail.com

comments.creator: left.lu@gmail.com
comments.text:
May I know if we are going to provide estimated remaining battery time in V1?

We have a github issue which is labeled blocking-basecamp+
https://github.com/mozilla-b2g/gaia/issues/4661
comments.author: left.lu@gmail.com
